project.name: Extended Server API
project.description: ZooZ Extended server API allows you to extend your control and manageability of your payment transactions. With the Extended Server API you can: 1. Defer payments -­‐approve your users’ purchases after they authorize ZooZ transactions 2. Get full details on transactions by transaction ID or payee email address. 3. Refund transactions Prior to initiating any forms of integration, it will be necessary for you to sign up for ZooZ at http://www.ZooZ.com The purpose of this guide is to provide you with all necessary information for integration, however if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at support@ZooZ.com
